description: Provides an overview of Austria, including key events and facts about this European country.
title: Austria country profile
maintext: For much of the post-war period, so-called "grand coalition" governments of left and right wing parties have ruled Austria, although the Social Democrats led by Bruno Kreisky ruled alone in the 1970s. Most recently, the centre right Austrian People's Party led by Sebastian Kurz ruled in coalition with the far-right Freedom Party, but this coalition collapsed in May 2019 after a scandal involving the leader of the Freedom Party Heinz-Christian Strache.
